name: Police Car City
description:
Police Car City!!!
Drive fast to take down the criminals trying to get away, stop them at all costs using top of the line police cop car interceptors! Complete police mission objectives to unlock even faster, more powerful police vehicles to stop criminals. Have access to some of the best cars to drive in a real police car game simulator.
Features:
- high quality graphics
- real car sounds
- upgrade cars
- various police cars
